refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The p:insert step inserts content into a document at the positions identified by the match pattern.
Multiple matches are allowed, in which case multiple copies of the insertion documents will occur. If no elements match, then the document is unchanged.
The value of the position option determines how the insertionis performed:

listitem.para: The insertion is made as the first child of the matched element.
The insertion is made as the last child of the matched element.
The insertion is made before the matched node.
The insertion is made after the matched node.

refsection.para: In the case of first-child and last-child, it is an error if the matched node is not an element (because the other kinds of nodes don’t have children).

row.entry: Occurs if the pattern matches anything other than element, text, processing-instruction, or comment nodes.
Occurs if the match pattern matches anything other than an element node and the value of the position option is “first-child” or “last-child”.
